verses.verse: The wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and the solitary place <S%H6723><s%> shall be glad <S%H7797><s%> for them; and the desert <S%H6160><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> and blossom <S%H6524><s%> as the rose. <S%H2261><s%>

It shall blossom abundantly, <S%H6524><s%> <S%H6524><s%> and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> even <S%H637><s%> with joy <S%H1525><s%> and singing: <S%H7442><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto it, the excellency <S%H1926><s%> of Carmel <S%H3760><s%> and Sharon, <S%H8289><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the excellency <S%H1926><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
Strengthen <S%H2388><s%> ye the weak <S%H7504><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and confirm <S%H553><s%> the feeble <S%H3782><s%> knees. <S%H1290><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> to them that are of a fearful <S%H4116><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> Be strong, <S%H2388><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> with vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> even God <S%H430><s%> with a recompense; <S%H1576><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> you.
Then <S%H227><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the blind <S%H5787><s%> shall be opened, <S%H6491><s%> and the ears <S%H241><s%> of the deaf <S%H2795><s%> shall be unstopped. <S%H6605><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall the lame <S%H6455><s%> man leap <S%H1801><s%> as a hart, <S%H354><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the dumb <S%H483><s%> sing: <S%H7442><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> shall waters <S%H4325><s%> break out, <S%H1234><s%> and streams <S%H5158><s%> in the desert. <S%H6160><s%>

And the parched ground <S%H8273><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> a pool, <S%H98><s%> and the thirsty land <S%H6774><s%> springs <S%H4002><s%> of water: <S%H4325><s%> in the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of dragons, <S%H8565><s%> where each lay, <S%H7258><s%> shall be grass <S%H2682><s%> with reeds <S%H7070><s%> and rushes. <S%H1573><s%>

And a highway <S%H4547><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and a way, <S%H1870><s%> and it shall be called <S%H7121><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of holiness; <S%H6944><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> it; but it <S%H1931><s%> shall be for those: the wayfaring men, <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1870><s%> though fools, <S%H191><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> err <S%H8582><s%> therein.

No <S%H3808><s%> lion <S%H738><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> nor <S%H1077><s%> any ravenous <S%H6530><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> shall go up <S%H5927><s%> thereon, it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> but the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> shall walk <S%H1980><s%> there:

And the ransomed <S%H6299><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> to Zion <S%H6726><s%> with songs <S%H7440><s%> and everlasting <S%H5769><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their heads: <S%H7218><s%> they shall obtain <S%H5381><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness, <S%H8057><s%> and sorrow <S%H3015><s%> and sighing <S%H585><s%> shall flee away. <S%H5127><s%>
